verses.verse: Look at what kind of love the Father has given to us, that we would be called God's children. Because of this, the world does not know us, because it did not know Him.
Loved ones, now we are God's children, and it was not yet shown what we will be. But we realize that if it might be shown, we will be like Him because we will see Him just as He is.
And everyone who has this anticipation based on Him consecrates himself, just as that One is consecrated.
Everyone committing the sin is also committing the crime. Actually the sin is the crime.
And you realize that that One was shown so that He might take away our sins, and sin is not in Him.
Everyone staying in Him is not sinning. Everyone sinning has not seen Him, nor known Him.
Little children, no one must mislead you. The person doing things the right way is right, just as that One is right.
The person committing the sin is from the Accuser because the Accuser is sinning from the beginning. For this, the Son of God was shown, so that He might undo the actions of the Accuser.
Everyone who has been born from God is not committing sin because His seed stays in him and is not able to be sinning because He has been born from God.
In this, the children of God and the children of the Accuser are shown: everyone not doing things the right way is not from God, also the person not loving his brother,
because this is the announcement that you heard from the beginning, that we should love each other.
Just not like Cain, he was from the evil one and slaughtered his brother. And thanks to what did he slaughter him? Because his actions were evil, but the actions of his brother were right.
Don't be amazed, my brothers, if the world hates you.
We realize that we have stepped from the death into the life because we love the brothers. The person not loving the brother stays in the death.
Everyone hating his brother is a people-killer, and you realize that every people-killer does not have life that spans all time staying in him.
In this we have known the love of God: because that Person put His soul out there on our behalf. We are also obligated to put our souls out there on behalf of the brothers.
Whoever has the livelihood of the world, watches his brother having a need, and closes his sympathy off from him, how is the love of God staying in him?
My little children, we should not love with words, nor with the tongue, but with action and truth.
And in this, we know that we are from the truth, and in front of Him we will persuade our hearts
that it is alright if our heart knows something against us because God is bigger than our heart and knows all things.
Loved ones, if our heart knows nothing against us, we have an openness close to God.
And whatever we request, we receive from the side of Him because we keep His demands and do the satisfying things in His sight.
And this is His demand, that we should trust in the name of His Son Jesus, the Anointed King, and love each other, just as He gave us a demand.
And the person keeping His demands stays in Him and He in him. And in this we know that He stays in us, from the Spirit that He gave us.
